name: Sub Sea
description:
Ready and fire the torpedo before the sea monster destroys your submarine! 

You only have one left so you had better make it count!

Controls

Move - Left Mouse Button

Interact - Right Mouse Button

Restart - Esc

Credits

Game by Adventure Byte

Music by Braden Keith

Art by Secondsanta - View More Work by Secondsanta

This game was created  in 48 hours for the 24th GM48, the theme was One Shot.

Feel free to leave comments and feedback about how to improve the game!
